heading: HR01965
0: RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT TO STRICTLY IMPLEMENT THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8491, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "FLAG AND HERALDIC CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES' WITH THE END IN VIEW OF INSTILLING GREATER RESPECT AND COMPLIANCE WITH THE NATIONAL ANTHEM, THE FLAG AND OTHER NATIONAL SYMBOLS AMONG THE CITIZENRY, PARTICULARLY THE YOUTH
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01965
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT TO STRICTLY IMPLEMENT THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8491, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "FLAG AND HERALDIC CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES' WITH THE END IN VIEW OF INSTILLING GREATER RESPECT AND COMPLIANCE WITH THE NATIONAL ANTHEM, THE FLAG AND OTHER NATIONAL SYMBOLS AMONG THE CITIZENRY, PARTICULARLY THE YOUTH
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2018-06-21
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2018-07-30
